At a very priced location just opposite to one of the biggest schools in Tricity (DPS World School) Spreaded in Approximately 33 Acres and with easy from all the three highway (Delhi-Chandigarh Highway, Zirakpur-Shimla Highway, old Kalka- Ambala Highway & PR 7 Airport Road.  Crystal Homes is one of the best located project in this region. Crystal Homes is a bouquet of 84 3BHK apartments with store.The best part about this project is that all the apartments are Sun Facing and Park Facing .We are providing finished apartments with complete wood work.  STRUCTURE:  Earthquake resistant RCC framed structure.  FLOORING:  Nanotechnology branded vitrified tiles in living, drawing, dining and bedrooms. Anti skid tiles to be used in washroom and balconies.  KITCHEN:  Complete modular kitchen with granite counter top and double bowl stainless steel sink with chimney.  DOORS/WINDOWS:  Branded flush doors with Red merandi/brown belly frames/Chowkath and wiremesh doors opening to balcony area.  HARDWARE:  Good quality hinges, handles with stylish modern looks and strength.  TOILETS:  Wall tiled upto 8 feet with ceramic and glazed tiles, flooring done with anti skid tiles. Washbasin and European WC with branded chrome plated brass fittings. Geyser facility in all washroom & kitchen.  INTERNAL FINISHES:  Acrylic emulsion in all the rooms and designer false ceiling with down lights in all the bedrooms + Drawing Dining area. Choice of Wallpaper/Texture paint as per your liking.  ELECTRICAL:  Copper wiring, concealed conduits, protective MCB, modular switches and provision for sufficient light and power point in all rooms. With rise in demand of quality housing at affordable price ,We initiated with Crystal Homes in Zirakpur. At a very priced location just opposite to one of the biggest schools in Tricity (DPS World School) Spreaded in Approximately 33 Acres and with easy from all the three highway (Delhi-Chandigarh Highway, Zirakpur-Shimla Highway, old Kalka- Ambala Highway & PR 7 Airport Road.  Crystal Homes is one of the best located project in this region. Crystal Homes is a bouquet of 84 3BHK apartments with store.The best part about this project is that all the apartments are Sun Facing and Park Facing .We are providing finished apartments with complete wood work.  STRUCTURE:  Earthquake resistant RCC framed structure.  FLOORING:  Nanotechnology branded vitrified tiles in living, drawing, dining and bedrooms. Anti skid tiles to be used in washroom and balconies.  KITCHEN:  Complete modular kitchen with granite counter top and double bowl stainless steel sink with chimney.  DOORS/WINDOWS:  Branded flush doors with Red merandi/brown belly frames/Chowkath and wiremesh doors opening to balcony area.  HARDWARE:  Good quality hinges, handles with stylish modern looks and strength.  TOILETS:  Wall tiled upto 8 feet with ceramic and glazed tiles, flooring done with anti skid tiles. Washbasin and European WC with branded chrome plated brass fittings. Geyser facility in all washroom & kitchen.  INTERNAL FINISHES:  Acrylic emulsion in all the rooms and designer false ceiling with down lights in all the bedrooms + Drawing Dining area. Choice of Wallpaper/Texture paint as per your liking.  ELECTRICAL:  Copper wiring, concealed conduits, protective MCB, modular switches and provision for sufficient light and power point in all rooms. TV and Telephone Sockets in Drawing, Dining and Bedrooms  Vastu Friendly Masterplan  Modern street light system  Uniterrupted Water supply  Gated complex  24-hour security, CCTV Surveillance  Gymnasium  badminton court  Description  3BHK Ready to move Flat in zirakpur,dhakoli.with  All facilites and amenities  GYM,  Splash pool,  Park,  Secured gated complex with seprate entry & exit.  24*7 CCTV Surveillance in common areas.  Kids play zone in the complex.  Reserved covered car parking with each flat.  LOCATION-Old ambala kalka road  Opp. DPS WORLD School dhakoli,zirakpur.

With rise in demand of quality housing at affordable price ,We initiated with Crystal Homes in Zirakpur. At a very priced location just opposite to one of the biggest schools in Tricity (DPS World School) Spreaded in Approximately 33 Acres and with easy from all the three highway (Delhi-Chandigarh Highway, Zirakpur-Shimla Highway, old Kalka- Ambala Highway & PR 7 Airport Road.  Crystal Homes is one of the best located project in this region. Crystal Homes is a bouquet of 84 3BHK apartments with store.The best part about this project is that all the apartments are Sun Facing and Park Facing .We are providing finished apartments with complete wood work.  STRUCTURE:  Earthquake resistant RCC framed structure.  FLOORING:  Nanotechnology branded vitrified tiles in living, drawing, dining and bedrooms. Anti skid tiles to be used in washroom and balconies.  KITCHEN:  Complete modular kitchen with granite counter top and double bowl stainless steel sink with chimney.  DOORS/WINDOWS:  Branded flush doors with Red merandi/brown belly frames/Chowkath and wiremesh doors opening to balcony area.  HARDWARE:  Good quality hinges, handles with stylish modern looks and strength.  TOILETS:  Wall tiled upto 8 feet with ceramic and glazed tiles, flooring done with anti skid tiles. Washbasin and European WC with branded chrome plated brass fittings. Geyser facility in all washroom & kitchen.  INTERNAL FINISHES:  Acrylic emulsion in all the rooms and designer false ceiling with down lights in all the bedrooms + Drawing Dining area. Choice of Wallpaper/Texture paint as per your liking.  ELECTRICAL:  Copper wiring, concealed conduits, protective MCB, modular switches and provision for sufficient light and power point in all rooms. Crystal Homes is a bouquet of 84 3BHK apartments with store.The best part about this project is that all the apartments are Sun Facing and Park Facing .We are providing finished apartments with complete wood work.  STRUCTURE:  Earthquake resistant RCC framed structure.  FLOORING:  Nanotechnology branded vitrified tiles in living, drawing, dining and bedrooms. Anti skid tiles to be used in washroom and balconies.  KITCHEN:  Complete modular kitchen with granite counter top and double bowl stainless steel sink with chimney.  DOORS/WINDOWS:  Branded flush doors with Red merandi/brown belly frames/Chowkath and wiremesh doors opening to balcony area. Washbasin and European WC with branded chrome plated brass fittings. Geyser facility in all washroom & kitchen.  INTERNAL FINISHES:  Acrylic emulsion in all the rooms and designer false ceiling with down lights in all the bedrooms + Drawing Dining area. Choice of Wallpaper/Texture paint as per your liking.  ELECTRICAL:  Copper wiring, concealed conduits, protective MCB, modular switches and provision for sufficient light and power point in all rooms. With rise in demand of quality housing at affordable price ,We initiated with Crystal Homes in Zirakpur. At a very priced location just opposite to one of the biggest schools in Tricity (DPS World School) Spreaded in Approximately 33 Acres and with easy from all the three highway (Delhi-Chandigarh Highway, Zirakpur-Shimla Highway, old Kalka- Ambala Highway & PR 7 Airport Road.  Crystal Homes is one of the best located project in this region. Crystal Homes is a bouquet of 84 3BHK apartments with store.The best part about this project is that all the apartments are Sun Facing and Park Facing .We are providing finished apartments with complete wood work.  STRUCTURE:  Earthquake resistant RCC framed structure.  FLOORING:  Nanotechnology branded vitrified tiles in living, drawing, dining and bedrooms. Anti skid tiles to be used in washroom and balconies.  KITCHEN:  Complete modular kitchen with granite counter top and double bowl stainless steel sink with chimney.  DOORS/WINDOWS:  Branded flush doors with Red merandi/brown belly frames/Chowkath and wiremesh doors opening to balcony area.  HARDWARE:  Good quality hinges, handles with stylish modern looks and strength.  TOILETS:  Wall tiled upto 8 feet with ceramic and glazed tiles, flooring done with anti skid tiles. Washbasin and European WC with branded chrome plated brass fittings. Geyser facility in all washroom & kitchen.  INTERNAL FINISHES:  Acrylic emulsion in all the rooms and designer false ceiling with down lights in all the bedrooms + Drawing Dining area. Choice of Wallpaper/Texture paint as per your liking.  ELECTRICAL:  Copper wiring, concealed conduits, protective MCB, modular switches and provision for sufficient light and power point in all rooms. At a very priced location just opposite to one of the biggest schools in Tricity (DPS World School) Spreaded in Approximately 33 Acres and with easy from all the three highway (Delhi-Chandigarh Highway, Zirakpur-Shimla Highway, old Kalka- Ambala Highway & PR 7 Airport Road.  Crystal Homes is one of the best located project in this region. Crystal Homes is a bouquet of 84 3BHK apartments with store.The best part about this project is that all the apartments are Sun Facing and Park Facing .We are providing finished apartments with complete wood work.  STRUCTURE:  Earthquake resistant RCC framed structure.  FLOORING:  Nanotechnology branded vitrified tiles in living, drawing, dining and bedrooms. Anti skid tiles to be used in washroom and balconies.  KITCHEN:  Complete modular kitchen with granite counter top and double bowl stainless steel sink with chimney.  DOORS/WINDOWS:  Branded flush doors with Red merandi/brown belly frames/Chowkath and wiremesh doors opening to balcony area.  HARDWARE:  Good quality hinges, handles with stylish modern looks and strength.  TOILETS:  Wall tiled upto 8 feet with ceramic and glazed tiles, flooring done with anti skid tiles. Washbasin and European WC with branded chrome plated brass fittings. Geyser facility in all washroom & kitchen.  INTERNAL FINISHES:  Acrylic emulsion in all the rooms and designer false ceiling with down lights in all the bedrooms + Drawing Dining area. Choice of Wallpaper/Texture paint as per your liking.  ELECTRICAL:  Copper wiring, concealed conduits, protective MCB, modular switches and provision for sufficient light and power point in all rooms. TV and Telephone Sockets in Drawing, Dining and Bedrooms  Vastu Friendly Masterplan  Modern street light system  Uniterrupted Water supply  Gated complex  24-hour security, CCTV Surveillance  Gymnasium  badminton court  Description  3BHK Ready to move Flat in zirakpur,dhakoli.with  All facilites and amenities  GYM,  Splash pool,  Park,  Secured gated complex with seprate entry & exit.  24*7 CCTV Surveillance in common areas.  Kids play zone in the complex.  Reserved covered car parking with each flat.  LOCATION-Old ambala kalka road  Opp. DPS WORLD School dhakoli,zirakpur.

Front balcony upstairs consists a tea/coffee area whereas a big Varanda and bbq area at the back.  1000 litre water tank and a Submarsible bore of 250+ feet is also available.  Please note that the Kothi was initially made for the owners personal residence so there has been a lot of top class safety work done such as around 15 pillars,tai beam and beams at 8 feet height all around the house were installed.
